SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Configuration
 
Crypto
Entity representing a cryptocurrency.
CryptoApplication
 
CryptoController
REST controller for retrieving cryptocurrency price information.
CryptoRepository
Repository class for performing database operations related to Crypto entities.
CryptoService
Service class for handling cryptocurrency-related operations.
Holding
Entity representing how much of a specific cryptocurrency a user has Contains information such as the user, cryptocurrency, quantity held, and investment amount.
HoldingDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a user's cryptocurrency holding.
HoldingRepository
Repository class for managing Holding entities in the database.
HoldingService
Service class for managing cryptocurrency holdings of users.
SnapshotDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing the snapshot data of a cryptocurrency.
SnapshotResponse
Represents the response data for a cryptocurrency snapshot.
Transaction
Entity representing a transaction made by a user buying/selling a cryptocurrency.
TransactionController
REST controller for managing cryptocurrency transactions.
TransactionDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a cryptocurrency transaction.
TransactionMethod
Enum representing the two possible methods of a cryptocurrency transaction.
TransactionOrchestrator
 
TransactionRepository
Repository class for managing Transaction entities.
TransactionRequest
Represents a request to create a transaction.
TransactionService
Service class for managing cryptocurrency transactions of users.
User
Represents a user in the system.
UserController
REST controller for managing users and their crypto-related data.
UserDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a user's information.
UserRepository
Repository class for managing User entities.
UserService
Service class for managing users and their transactions in the crypto system.
UserService.UserNotFoundException
Custom exception to handle cases when a user is not found.
